definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
(of a turn of events) not too encouraging/far from good/anything but reassuring
exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life
miraculous hands of a healer/highly skilled person/brilliant move in chess or weiqi (go) 圍棋|围棋
effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
(of a girl) in the prime of youth

sentences.english: What's beautiful about the idea of micropayments is that it's a win-win for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 小额支付的主意妙在它对于大家都有好处。

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌间搁浅的妙蔓，是想为你舞一曲最后倾国倾城。

sentences.english: Spring is just wonderful world, Jalan poem several times before the wedding day.
sentences.chinese: 妙是人间春正好，佳期几度惹诗才。

sentences.english: The turrets you have equipped are shown on screen and they look amazing.
sentences.chinese: 你装备的塔楼显示在屏幕上，他们看起来非常妙。

sentences.english: Which techniques and tricks have you used to get ahead in your own career?
sentences.chinese: 你运用过什么技巧和妙招来取得事业上的成功呢？

sentences.english: What are your tricks for decorating small spaces?
sentences.chinese: 在归置小空间方面，你的妙招是什么呢？

sentences.english: And the thing was good in the eyes of Pharaoh, and in the eyes of all his servants.
sentences.chinese: 法老和他一切臣仆都以这事为妙。

sentences.english: All Arts aspire to the condition of music.
sentences.chinese: 诸艺造妙皆向往于音乐之空灵澹荡。

sentences.english: The plan seemed good to Pharaoh and to all his officials.
sentences.chinese: 法老和他一切臣仆都以这事为妙。

sentences.english: Person is kinds of Polo honey with pleasure, It is wonderful to hit all the treasure.
sentences.chinese: 者样波罗蜜，便是妙中宝。

sentences.english: It is fantastic because human beings know to apply human psychology to subhuman animals.
sentences.chinese: 此招妙就妙在人将自己的心理推及到了类人的动物。

sentences.english: Domoraud equalised, from Bunce 's excellent cross, after just three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 开场仅三分钟，多莫劳德接邦斯的妙传扳平了比分。

sentences.english: Clearly, Finnie has a knack for inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 显然，范尼有激励学生的妙招。

sentences.english: In a masterstroke, Anna refused to come out of jail, and continued his fast there.
sentences.chinese: 妙的是，安纳拒绝走出监狱，并在里面继续他的绝食。

sentences.english: China seems to have already realize the painting, Miao-like and not like in between the real Dili.
sentences.chinese: 似乎早已悟出了中国画“妙在似与不似之间”的真帝。

sentences.english: The next time he saw those two beauties, he could look them straight in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 下一回，他见了这两个妙人儿，可以正眼瞧他们了。

definition: masterly/subtle and clever (or artwork, writing etc)
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
